channel.title: Item.cfg help!
channel.description:
[b]Problem:[/b] [i]I was making shops, I compiled (after saving) and KABOOM![/i]
[b]Server Base:[/b] [i]MegaScape-Unreleased-PimpScape[/i]
[b]Rating:[/b] [i]10 for me, I have no idea how to fix.[/i]
[code]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. MegaScape is now running on 0.0.0.0:5555 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)[/code]
[b]Thanks[/b] in advance.

item.title: Item.cfg help!
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

all that ment was that you had obviously been adding maybe stats or an amount of cost and instead of hitting tab youve hit space… or maybe tab and space and this causes the server to get an error where it wont allow people to connect … wasnt really that hard… not suprising you got it without help… and its good you got it without help… it helps you learn by doing it yourself

Read full topic

item.title: Item.cfg help!
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

If you gonna edit your server, ALWAYS MAKE A BACKUP

Read full topic

item.title: Item.cfg help!
item.dc:creator: @Valid Valid
item.description:
@Valid wrote:

Problem: I was making shops, I compiled (after saving) and KABOOM!

Server Base: MegaScape-Unreleased-PimpScape

Rating: 10 for me, I have no idea how to fix.

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. MegaScape is now running on 0.0.0.0:5555 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)

Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
